    • Constructor Detail

      • ResetButtonListener

        public ResetButtonListener(java.lang.String userName,
                   javax.swing.JFrame parentFrame)

        Constructor creates an instance of this class. It takes two parameters which indicate the user's name and a JFrame object.

        This object is added to the reset button.

        Parameters:
        userName - indicates user's name.
        parentFrame - indicates the JFrame object that contains the Reset button

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent arg0)

        Implemented ActionListener method.

        • Removes everything from the parent frame
        • Calls GiftIdeaApplicationController.setGift() method with no parameters.
          This sets Gift to Gift.NONE
        • Adds a new GiftIdeaApplicationWorkPanel to the Content Pane of the parent JFrame
          • j
        • Revalidates and repaints the contents of the Content Pane of the parent JFrame
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
